io.odysz.sworkflow

Class CheapApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.odysz.sworkflow.CheapApi

  • public class CheapApi
extends Object
    CheapEngine API for server side, equivalent to js/cheapwf.
    Check Schedual.startInspectask() for sample code.
    Author:
    ody

      • start

        public static CheapApi start(String wftype,
                             String... existask)
        Get an API instance to start a new workflow of type wftype.
        Parameters:
        wftype -
        existask - optional, if not exists, cheap engine will create a task record.
        Returns:
        new CheapApi instance

      • commitReq

        public io.odysz.semantics.SemanticObject commitReq(io.odysz.semantics.IUser usr)
                                            throws SQLException,
                                                   io.odysz.transact.x.TransException
        Commit current request set in req. TODO how about rename this as doCmd()?
        Parameters:
        usr -
        Returns:
        { evt: CheapEvent for start event(new task ID must resolved),
        stepHandler: CheapEvent for req (step/deny/next) if there is one configured,
        arriHandler: CheapEvent for arriving event if there is one configured
        }
        Throws:
        SQLException
        io.odysz.transact.x.TransException
